message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $9000 is a bit high for me right now.  Would you be willing to come down to $8000?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $8500.
